thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: BapMik Boo

author: BapMik Boo
title: BapMik Boo
text:
Big thanks to Lauren Alfonzo for helping me get a new set of Muhammad Ali picture not once but twice I had to send back and get it replaced and she was at her best to make it happen ... thank you so much .. now I feel better about ordering more stuff , knowing that I will be taken care of when or if needed
Feeling very happy and blessed :)
Thank you Lauren Alfonzo u are the best & the rest of the team that put their effort to help replace our item and make customers very happy ..
much love to u all
